Welcome to Ireaneus Linux Cheat Sheets webpage

Linux command line cheat sheets website

View on GitHub

To connect to an IRC server

/connect

To join a channel

/join #

To set a nickname

/nick

To send a private message to a user

/msg

To close the current channel window

/wc

To switch between channel windows

ALT+, eg. ALT+1, ALT+2

To list the nicknames within a channel

/names

To change the topic

/topic

To quit irssi

/exit
